testcase.name: testLogin

failure.message: Exception occurred: Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of Proxy element for: DefaultElementLocator 'By.xpath: //img[contains(@src, 'orangehrm-logo.png')]' (tried for 15 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)
